name: Bluejam
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking KO up to one of your opponents characters with 2000 Power or less.

effect.text: KO up to one of your opponents characters with 2000 Power or less.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but this is not a valid card for the deck builder. The card ID is OP07-011, which is a valid card in the One Piece TCG.
